description: This file provides a client-side service module to interact with alert-related backend API endpoints. It includes functions to list, create, update, delete, and enable/disable alert rules, as well as list alert events, with internal utility functions to handle request attempts and response normalization.

methods.name: tryMany({ method, path, query, body })
methods.description: Attempts an API request across multiple prefix routes until one succeeds or all fail.

methods.name: normalizeListResponse(data)
methods.description: Normalizes various possible formats of response data into a standard item list.

methods.name: listAlertRules({ instanceId } = {})
methods.description: Fetches a list of alert rules, optionally filtered by instanceId.

methods.name: createAlertRule(payload)
methods.description: Creates a new alert rule with given payload.

methods.name: updateAlertRule(ruleId, patch)
methods.description: Updates an existing alert rule identified by ruleId with specified changes.

methods.name: deleteAlertRule(ruleId)
methods.description: Deletes an alert rule identified by ruleId.

methods.name: setAlertRuleEnabled(ruleId, enabled)
methods.description: Enables or disables an alert rule by updating its 'enabled' property.

methods.name: listAlertEvents({ instanceId, status,  severity,  since,  until, q,  cursor, limit = 20, } = {})
methods.description: Fetches a list of alert events, with support for filtering and pagination.

ctags.name: listAlertEvents
ctags.signature: ({ instanceId, status,  severity,  since,  until, q,  cursor, limit = 20, } = {})

ctags.name: tryMany
ctags.pattern: /^async function tryMany({ method, path, query, body }) {$/
